messages.subject: More Alaskan's here! (was: New to List)
messages.msgSnippet: ... here, just wish you were closer!
messages.messageBody:
Susan wrote:
>>>I live in Alaska too, in Wasilla. Great to have someone else living
here, just wish you were closer!<<<

Hi Susan,
I'm closer to you, Chugiak :-) I've been meaning to post
an intro but I'm in my garden so much I hardly get to the
puter!

I have a 9yo daughter and 5 yo son. We have been home schooling/
unschooling for 4 years. My children would love to get
together with other unschooler's...in fact I have been
thinking of starting a group for Eagle River/Chugiak.
The valley is so close, maybe we could even start
a group that includes Palmer/Wasilla?

I'm really motivated to start a new group but haven't
a clue how to do that. Any of you more experienced,
organized Mom's and Dad's have some tip's?

Thank's for any tip's on organizing a group!
Jackie
(who once again has not introduced herself properly :)
--
Jackie Daugherty
mailto:oils@...
